title: Employee of The Month 2025
text:
Selamat datang di situs Web Employee of The Month.



Alur pemberian Employee of the Month

title: Rata-Rata Lama Sekolah
text:
library(tidyverse)
library(foreign)
library(srvyr)
library(here)
library(knitr)


kor_ind1 <- read.dbf(here("qmd/misc/ssn2024_03/data/5310_ssn_202403_kor_ind1.dbf")) |> as_tibble()

kor_ind1 |> names()

  [1] "URUT"    "PSU"     "SSU"     "STRATA"  "WI1"     "WI2"     "R101"   
  [8] "R102"    "R105"    "R401"    "R403"    "R404"    "R405"    "R406A"  
 [15] "R406B"   "R406C"   "R407"    "R408"    "R409"    "R410"    "R501"   
 [22] "R502"    "R503"    "R504"    "R506"    "R507"    "R508"    "R509"   
 [29] "R601"    "R602"    "R603"    "R604"    "R605"    "R606"    "R606_A" 
 [36] "R606_B"  "R606_X"  "R607"    "R608"    "R609"    "R610"    "R611"   
 [43] "R612"    "R613"    "R614"    "R615"    "R616"    "R617"    "R618"   
 [50] "R619"    "R620"    "R621"    "R701"    "R702"    "R703_A"  "R703_B" 
 [57] "R703_C"  "R703_D"  "R703_X"  "R704"    "R705"    "R706"    "R707"

 [85] "R811_B"  "R811_C"  "R811_D"  "R811_E"  "R811_F"  "R811_G"  "R811_H" 
 [92] "R811_I"  "R811_J"  "R811_K"  "R811_L"  "R812"    "R901"    "R902"   
 [99] "R903"    "R904"    "R905"    "R906"    "R907"    "R908"    "R909"   
[106] "R910"    "R911"    "R912"    "R913"    "R914"    "R915"    "R916"   
[113] "R1001"   "R1010"   "R1101_A" "R1101_B" "R1101_C" "R1101_D" "R1101_E"
[120] "R1101_X" "R1102"   "R1103"   "R1104"   "R1105"   "R1106"   "R1107_A"
[127] "R1107_B" "R1107_C" "R1107_D" "R1107_E" "R1107_F" "R1107_G" "R1107_H"
[134] "R1108"   "R1109_A" "R1109_B" "R1109_C" "R1109_D" "R1109_E" "R1109_X"
[141] "R1110_A" "R1110_B" "R1110_C" "R1110_D" "R1110_E" "R1110_F" "R1110_G"
[148] "R1110_H" "R1110_I" "R1201"   "R1202_A" "R1202_B" "R1202_C" "R1202_D"
[155] "R1202_E" "R1202_F" "R1202_G" "R1203"   "R1204_A" "R1204_B" "R1204_C"
[162] "R1204_D" "R1204_E" "R1204_X" "R1205_A" "R1205_B" "R1205_C" "R1205_D"
[169] "R1205_E" "R1205_F" "R1205_G" "R1205_H" "R1205_I" "R1206"   "R1207"  
[176] "R1208"   "R1209"   "FWT"    






tbl_r6xx <- 
kor_ind1 |>
  select(
    URUT:R105, 
    FWT,
    R407,
    R610:R614
  ) |>
  rename(
    umur = R407, 
    partisipasi_sekolah = R610, 
    jenjang_akhir = R612, 
    kelas_akhir = R613, 
    ijazah_akhir = R614
  )

kable(head(tbl_r6xx, n = 10))

tbl_rls <- 
tbl_r6xx |>
  filter(umur >= 25) |>
  mutate(
    konversi_ijazah_akhir = 
      case_when(
        ijazah_akhir == 25 ~ 0,
        ijazah_akhir |> between(1, 5) ~ 6,
        ijazah_akhir |> between(6, 10) ~ 9,
        ijazah_akhir |> between(11, 17) ~ 12,
        ijazah_akhir == 18 ~ 14, 
        ijazah_akhir == 19 ~ 15,
        ijazah_akhir |> between(20, 21) ~ 16,
        ijazah_akhir |> between(22, 24) ~ 18,
        .default = NA
      )
  ) |>
  mutate(
    lama_sekolah = case_when(
      partisipasi_sekolah == 1 ~ 0,
      
      partisipasi_sekolah == 2 & konversi_ijazah_akhir < 12  ~ konversi_ijazah_akhir + kelas_akhir - 1,
      partisipasi_sekolah == 2 & konversi_ijazah_akhir |> between(12, 15) & kelas_akhir < 8 ~ konversi_ijazah_akhir + 1,
      partisipasi_sekolah == 2 & konversi_ijazah_akhir >= 16 ~ konversi_ijazah_akhir + 1,

      
      
      partisipasi_sekolah == 3 & kelas_akhir < 8 & konversi_ijazah_akhir < 16 ~ konversi_ijazah_akhir + kelas_akhir - 1,
      partisipasi_sekolah == 3 & kelas_akhir < 8 & konversi_ijazah_akhir >= 16 ~ konversi_ijazah_akhir + 1,
      partisipasi_sekolah == 3 & kelas_akhir == 8 ~ konversi_ijazah_akhir,
      .default = NA
    )
  )

kable(head(tbl_rls, n = 10))

mean(tbl_rls$lama_sekolah)

[1] 6.625169






library(srvyr)

srvyr_design_rls <- 
as_survey_design(
  .data = tbl_rls, 
  weights = FWT, 
  ids = c(PSU, SSU),
  strata = STRATA,
  nest = TRUE
)


srvyr_design_rls |>
  summarise(RLS = survey_mean(lama_sekolah))

# A tibble: 1 Ã— 2
    RLS RLS_se
  <dbl>  <dbl>
1  6.80  0.253






library(survey)

survey_design_rls <- svydesign(
  id = ~ 1, 
  data = tbl_rls, 
  weights = tbl_rls$FWT, 
  strata = tbl_rls$STRATA, 
  nest = TRUE
  )

svymean(x = ~ lama_sekolah, design = survey_design_rls)

               mean     SE
lama_sekolah 6.8042 0.1528





Jadi, kenapa angkanya masih berbeda ?
Kemungkinan ini karena profesional adjustment.
BPS melakukan sedikit perubahan sesuai dengan fenomena/kebijakan dari suatu daerah. RLS adalah indikator yang diestimasi secara top-down.

  filter(umur >= 25) |>
  mutate(
    konversi_ijazah_akhir = 
      case_when(
        ijazah_akhir == 25 ~ 0,

  ) |>
  mutate(
    lama_sekolah = case_when(
      partisipasi_sekolah == 1 ~ 0,
      
      partisipasi_sekolah == 2 & konversi_ijazah_akhir < 12  ~ konversi_ijazah_akhir + kelas_akhir - 1,

  id = ~ 1, 
  data = tbl_rls, 
  weights = tbl_rls$FWT, 
  strata = tbl_rls$STRATA,

BPS melakukan sedikit perubahan sesuai dengan fenomena/kebijakan dari suatu daerah. RLS adalah indikator yang diestimasi secara top-down.

title: Rata-Rata Lama Sekolah
text:
Histogram

hist(tbl_rls$lama_sekolah)







ggplot(tbl_rls) +
  geom_histogram(aes(x = lama_sekolah), bins = 15) + 
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0, 6, 9, 12, 18))







tbl_rls |>
  filter(umur >= 25) |>
  mutate(warna = lama_sekolah <= 6) |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(aes(x = lama_sekolah, fill = warna), bins = 15) + 
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0, 6, 9, 12, 18))







theme_set(theme_bw())

tbl_rls |>
  filter(umur > 25) |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = umur, y = lama_sekolah)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0, 6, 9, 12, 18))
